attributes.action: Form a Public Elected Committee to Oversee a Reform of MPs Wage and Allowances
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Form a Public elected Committee to take charge of changing The amount MPs are Payed and the cancelation of all allowances except for a moderate overnight accomidation which MPs would have to submite a genuine reciete all taxi fares would be payed for out of there own wages no family members or Wifes could be employed by MPs and all MPs Offices and staff would be payed for and run by the westminster office its self all MPsWould be Banned from claiming second home or accomidation allowances only travel allowances would be paid on reciete of the travel recietes handed in to westminster offices MPs would not be required to employ office staff they would be suplied and payed for by westminster offices, all MPs wage increases would be voted on by the Public Elected Committee.
